sentence.text: This includes the first two genes linked to recessively inherited isolated dystonia, that is, positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration (hippocalcin) and COL6A3 (collagen VI alpha 3).

entity.text: positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration

sentence.text: The novel myoclonus-dystonia genes KCTD17 and modulation of chemical synaptic transmission also implicate abnormal calcium signaling in dystonia.

Defects in neurodevelopment likewise seem to be a recurrent scheme underpinning mainly complex dystonias, for example those attributable to biallelic mutations in GCH1, TH, positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration, or to heterozygous negative regulation of microtubule polymerization mutations.

entity.text: positive regulation of cytosolic calcium ion concentration
